I love the puzzles, the mechanics, and the challenges. The short length and versatility of the mechanics give it massive replay-ability. Portal may have come out in 2007, but it holds up amazingly, and I can recommend it to any and every gamer.

A fun and challenging puzzle game, with the commentary of a psychotic yet funny robot. GLaDOS is not as funny as in portal 2, but still causes a lot of laughs here. Great game by Valve, and I highly reccomend.

An interesting game.

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

An amazing game made by a small group at the time, the humor is great and the gameplay is even better. There's a 50/50 chance you'll either be an absolute god at this game, or you'll get stuck on chamber 18 for about 2 hours. It really gives you the perspective of a test subject waking up alone, you slowly find out what has happened to everybody and you start to understand the robot voice's real intentions. The only problem I have is the fact there is no replayability besides the bonus chambers and speedrunning

 The game is great. Simple graphics compared to newer games. Still holds up, still challenging and still great fun. The story has a dark twist and isn't just straight up puzzles. Good brain trainer haha.

传送门一代，令人惊艳的系列的开山鼻祖。传送门这个创意可以说非常有趣，V社更是将其表现得很完美。
相对于二代来说，一代更像是单纯的谜题解谜，它没有什么电影般的叙事手法（可能最后一关算？还有很有意思的boss战）。个人感觉一代的基调是比二代低沉的，整个环境给人一种黑暗或者说阴冷的感觉，以及一些实验室外的房间，cake is a lie，还有血手印，锈蚀而破败的环境，和整洁明亮的实验室形成鲜明对比。不过依然存在3D眩晕的问题，不过一代稍微会好于二代。
当然一代的整体难度是不如二代的。但是要是完整的体验传送门的故事，一代肯定不容错过。作为经典中的经典，你可以看到很多游戏对传送门的致敬，如果你还没有尝试过这款游戏，那就不要犹豫。打折后的白菜价，不到一杯奶茶钱，却可以带给你几十个小时的惊艳的游戏体验。就像人们常说的，游戏最本质的是好玩，抛开社交养成等等因素，游戏本身的乐趣才应该是玩家最应该去体验的。当你能够沉下心来体验一款好游戏的时候，那些648,388起步的手游相比之下就没那么吸引人了，或许也能理解为什么游戏圈一直存在的鄙视链了。
跑题了不好意思。言归正传，传送门毫无疑问是一款好玩的解谜游戏，请诸君不要错过哦。

Portal sin duda es recomendable para cualquier tipo de publico gracias a sus puzzles que suben su dificultad de manera gradual sin llegar a ser injustas, es decir, si nos quedamos estancados o morimos será completamente nuestra culpa ya que, su control a pesar de los años cumple su función correctamente en el momento de una acción. Sus niveles variados y la variedad de posibilidades que nos dan los portales hacen que el juego no se quede repetitivo al paso de los niveles, sumado al hecho que gráficamente a envejecido bastante bien nos da una experiencia divertida y ligera.

Está a un precio precio bueno, te dará unas buenas horas de juego bastante entretenidas.

Игра хороша, правда продолжительность довольно маленькая (если сравнивать со второй частью (Portal 2)).
Головоломки простые, но есть и усложнённые версии (Они присутствуют в самой игре), приятным бонусом стало и "коментарии разробочиков" сделанных в игровой форме. Игра пройдена мной несколько раз, советую играть с английской ОЗВУЧКОЙ т. к. с русской реплики парой просто обрываются или просто не проигрываются, но если не брать это во внимание, то всё хорошо! (Багов лично мной не было найдено!)

Portal is what I'd call a masterpiece, although is a bit old by now, it holds up. This is one of my first games to play ever, and it holds a very special place in my heart. Honestly this game is so awesome. You play as a test subject, where you have to go through 19 test chambers, in which there are multiple obstacles you'd have to avoid.
This game is what got me into gaming, the cake might be a lie, but the gameplay is amazing.

Super fun game, I love the humor in it. It makes me think of what I have to do to advance.
I recommend this game to any one who wants to experiment with their game taste, because it truly is unique.
